casebody.data:
No. 10-5795. Donald G. Jones, Petitioner v. The Shaw Group, et al.; Donald G. Jones, Petitioner v. First Bank & Trust; and Donald G. Jones, Petitioner v. The Shaw Group, et al. 562 U.S. 967, 131 S. Ct. 468,

178 L. Ed. 2d 298,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8124. October 12, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
